data.event: In September 2015, Advanced LIGO detected the first direct Gravitational wave observation which was reported in February 2016.
In September 2015, Advanced LIGO detected the first direct Gravitational wave observation which was reported in February 2016.
The communities of Doyle and Livingston, combined in 1955 to create the Town of Livingston.

Doyle was established northeast of present-day Livingston, located on Hog Branch off of present-day North Doyle Road but moved when the railroad was built from Baton Rouge to Hammond, and the community was re-located in 1901 by the McDonald Family.

event.title: was started by the Lyons Lumber Company in 1916

data.event: Livingston was started by the Lyons Lumber Company in 1916 as a logging community on 63 acres just west of Doyle, to support their logging industry and timber mill in Garyville, located south of Livingston on the Mississippi River.
